1482120.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Adventurers League 10-00 Ice Road Trackers
1482120.description:
D&D Adventurers League 10-00 Ice Road Trackers

A trek toward Icewind Dale turns deadly when an avalanche blocks the heroes' passage through the Spine of the World. Rescued by a menagerie of strange creatures, the heroes are asked to return the favor in exchange for answers about what's happening in the cold and frozen North.
An introductory adventure comprising four 1-hour episodes.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
Danny Stratton
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
